member.name: T:PTV.Application.OpenApi.Attributes.ValidateDateAttribute
member.summary: Checks the date query string parameter format.

member.name: M:PTV.Application.OpenApi.Controllers.GeneralDescriptionOutputController.Get(System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets all the statutory service general descriptions within PTV as a list of ids. Descriptions created/modified after certain date can be fetched by adding date as query string parameter.
member.returns: A list of general description ids.

member.name: M:PTV.Application.OpenApi.Controllers.GeneralDescriptionOutputController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Fetches all the information related to a single statutory service general description.
member.returns: Detailed information about a statutory service general description.

member.name: M:PTV.Application.OpenApi.Controllers.OrganizationController.Get(System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets all the published organizations within PTV as a list of organization ids. Organizations created/modified after certain date can be fetched by adding date as query string parameter.
member.param: The page number to be fetched.

member.name: M:PTV.Application.OpenApi.Controllers.OrganizationController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Fetches all the information related to a single organization.

member.name: M:PTV.Application.OpenApi.Controllers.OrganizationController.Post(PTV.Domain.Model.Models.OpenApi.VmOpenApiOrganizationIn)
member.summary: Creates a new organization with the data provided as input.

member.name: M:PTV.Application.OpenApi.Controllers.ServiceChannelController.Get(System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets all published service channels within PTV as a list of service channel ids. Service channels created/modified after certain date can be fetched by adding date as query string parameter.
member.returns: A list of service channel ids.

member.name: M:PTV.Application.OpenApi.Controllers.ServiceChannelController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Fetches all the information related to a single service channel.
member.returns: Detailed information about a service channel.

member.name: M:PTV.Application.OpenApi.Controllers.ServiceChannelController.GetByEntity(System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets a list of certain type of published service channels. Service channels created/modified after certain date can be fetched by adding date as query string parameter.
member.returns: Detailed information about certain type of service channels.

member.name: M:PTV.Application.OpenApi.Controllers.ServiceChannelController.GetByOrganizationId(System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets a list of published service channels for defined organization. Service channels created/modified after certain date can be fetched by adding date as query string parameter.

member.name: M:PTV.Application.OpenApi.Controllers.ServiceChannelController.GetByOrganizationIdAndType(System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets a list of certain type of published service channels for defined organization. Service channels created/modified after certain date can be fetched by adding date as query string parameter.

member.name: M:PTV.Application.OpenApi.Controllers.ServiceController.Get(System.Nullable{System.DateTime},System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets all the published services within PTV as a list of service ids. Services created after certain date can be fetched by adding date as query string parameter.
member.param: The page number to be fetched.

member.name: M:PTV.Application.OpenApi.Controllers.ServiceController.Get(System.String)
member.summary: Fetches all the information related to a single service.

member.name: M:PTV.Application.OpenApi.Controllers.ServiceController.GetByServiceChannel(System.String,System.Nullable{System.DateTime})
member.summary: Gets a list of published services for defined service channel. Services joined to service channel after certain date can be fetched by adding date as query string parameter.

member.name: M:PTV.Application.OpenApi.Controllers.ServiceController.Post(PTV.Domain.Model.Models.OpenApi.VmOpenApiServiceIn)
member.summary: Creates a new service with the data provided as input.
